originalTitle: The king's speech - and why it has foreigners in South Africa worried
title: The king's speech - and why it has foreigners in South Africa worried
content: The Zulu king was trying to calm anti-migrant feelings but ended up using a highly derogatory phrase.

originalTitle: Aspiring Nigerian singer dies after being bitten by a snake
title: Aspiring Nigerian singer dies after being bitten by a snake
content: Ifunanya Nwangene, a former contestant in The Voice Nigeria, died after not getting the antivenom she needed.

originalTitle: Four Britons die after holiday sickness in Cape Verde, say lawyers
title: Four Britons die after holiday sickness in Cape Verde, say lawyers
content: A law firm says it is representing the families of six people who holidayed in Cape Verde.

originalTitle: How will Pakistan deal with the unrest in Balochistan?
title: How will Pakistan deal with the unrest in Balochistan?
content: The most recent coordinated attacks by separatists in the southwestern province have killed dozens of people.

originalTitle: Epstein email reveals plan to access Libya’s frozen state assets
title: Epstein email reveals plan to access Libya’s frozen state assets
content: Email sent to Jeffrey Epstein in 2011 outlines what the sender described as financial and legal opportunities in Libya.

originalTitle: Gaza patients in limbo amid Israel’s ‘pilot reopening’ of Rafah crossing
title: Gaza patients in limbo amid Israel’s ‘pilot reopening’ of Rafah crossing
content: The Rafah crossing’s pilot opening begins amid confusion as Gaza’s patients face unclear criteria, limited travel slots.

originalTitle: Twelve miners killed by Russian strike in Ukraine, energy company says
title: Twelve miners killed by Russian strike in Ukraine, energy company says
content: Seven others were reported injured in the strike near a bus carrying the workers on Sunday.

originalTitle: Epstein sent $75,000 to accounts linked to Mandelson, files suggest
title: Epstein sent $75,000 to accounts linked to Mandelson, files suggest
content: Lord Mandelson says he has no record or recollection of receiving the sums and does not know if the documents are authentic.

originalTitle: Iranian protester Erfan Soltani released on bail, reports say
title: Iranian protester Erfan Soltani released on bail, reports say
content: Reports in January had said he was due to be executed after his arrest in connection with anti-government protests.

originalTitle: Is Carrick proving Amorim's Man Utd tenure was a wasted year?
title: Is Carrick proving Amorim's Man Utd tenure was a wasted year?
content: A third win in a row for Michael Carrick highlights the failures of Ruben Amorim's time at Manchester United.

originalTitle: Solanke scorpion kick helps Spurs fight back against Man City
title: Solanke scorpion kick helps Spurs fight back against Man City
content: Dominic Solanke scores twice, including a spectacular scorpion kick, as Tottenham come from behind to draw against Manchester City with a rousing second-half performance.

originalTitle: Sesko scores dramatic late winner as Man Utd beat Fulham
title: Sesko scores dramatic late winner as Man Utd beat Fulham
content: Manchester United avoided Fulham's late comeback due to a Benjamin Sesko goal in stoppage time to give United three points and continue head coach Michael Carrick's perfect start.
